General.Name: ML System S.A
General.Description: ML System S.A. produces and distributes photovoltaic solutions in Poland. The company offers BIPV, PV, semi-flexible PV, and ultra PV modules. It also provides smart city products comprising terrace shelters, car parking roofing, smart pylon, intelligent bus shelter, photovoltaic lamp, and smart benches; intelligent heating glass, glass with an active quantum coating for automotive and construction industry, variable translucency glass, and glass heater, and sill glass. In addition, the company offers AntyCovid products; photovoltaic sunshades, photovoltaic façade panels, photovoltaic roof tiles, photovoltaic insulated glass, photovoltaic skylights, PV Max color modules, and building management systems. Further, the company provides fault detection, inspection, repair, and maintenance services. ML System S.A. was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Zaczernie, Poland.
